name: cppcheck-misra
description: Run cppcheck (2.18.0) with strict MISRA C:2012 (C) and MISRA C++:2023 (C++) checking on C/C++ files

commands.title: Cppcheck MISRA: Run on current file

cppcheck-misra.enableOnSave.description: Run cppcheck MISRA automatically on file save

cppcheck-misra.cStd.description: C language standard passed to cppcheck via --std=<value> for C files.

cppcheck-misra.cppStd.description: C++ language standard passed to cppcheck via --std=<value> for C++ files.

cppcheck-misra.enable.description: Pass --enable=<id>. Note: --enable=all can increase noise/false positives unless you scan whole program.

cppcheck-misra.checkLevel.description: Cppcheck --check-level. Use exhaustive for stricter valueflow analysis (slower).

cppcheck-misra.force.description: Pass --force to check more preprocessor configurations.

cppcheck-misra.maxConfigs.description: Pass --max-configs=<n>. Increase to avoid skipping files with many preprocessor configurations.

cppcheck-misra.safety.description: Pass --safety to enable safety-certified checking mode (stricter, may change exit codes).

cppcheck-misra.jobs.description: Pass -j <n> to run cppcheck with multiple threads.

cppcheck-misra.suppressMissingIncludeSys.description: Suppress missingIncludeSystem (system headers not found) via --suppress=missingIncludeSystem.

cppcheck-misra.severityMapping.mandatory.description: Diagnostic severity for MISRA Mandatory violations

cppcheck-misra.severityMapping.required.description: Diagnostic severity for MISRA Required violations

cppcheck-misra.severityMapping.advisory.description: Diagnostic severity for MISRA Advisory violations

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
